docs.lead_paragraph: The Comedy Central news satire show has hired Baratunde Thurston to oversee digital content that it will create under Trevor Noah, the new host.
docs.abstract: Comedy Central hires humorist and social activist Baratunde Thurston to oversee production of digital content for The Daily Show under host Trevor Noah; digital endeavor represents expansion beyond show's traditional television format.

headline.main: ‘The Daily Show’ Gets Ready to Go Viral
headline.print_headline: ‘The Daily Show’ Plans to Go Viral

docs.snippet: The university on Monday ordered the campus chapter of Sigma Alpha Epsilon to vacate its house after videos appeared to show members singing slurs....
docs.lead_paragraph: The university on Monday ordered the campus chapter of Sigma Alpha Epsilon to vacate its house after videos appeared to show members singing slurs.
docs.abstract: University of Oklahoma cuts ties to college fraternity Sigma Alpha Epsilon and orders campus chapter to vacate its house, after videos come to light that show a group of young white people singing song laden with anti-black lyrics and at least one reference to lynching.

headline.seo: University of Oklahoma Cuts Ties to Sigma Alpha Epsilon Fraternity Over Racist Videos
headline.main: Fraternity Is Closed Over Video With Slurs
headline.print_headline: Fraternity Is Closed Over Video With Slurs

byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez reported from Norman, and Richard Perez-Pena from New York. Liam Stack contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA

docs.snippet: Advertising agencies are for the first time turning to Instagram more frequently than Twitter for social media ad campaigns, a survey released Thursday showed, a further indication of weakness in an ad sales operation that has been one of the few ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Advertising agencies are for the first time turning to Instagram more frequently than Twitter for social media ad campaigns, a survey released Thursday showed, a further indication of weakness in an ad sales operation that has been one of the few bright spots for Twitter.

headline.main: Instagram Attracting More Advertising Than Twitter: Survey
